summary: How LA Learned to Love Modern Art. A lesson in how a few renegade artists built an art scene from scratch.
cast: Eve Babitz|John Baldessari|Larry Bell|Billy Al Bengston|Edmond Bereal|Irving Blum|Jeff Bridges|Charles Brittin|William Claxton|Donald Factor|Sonia Gechtoff|Frank Gehry|Hal Glicksman|Peter Goulds|Elyse Grinstein|Stanley Grinstein|Henry Hopkins|Dennis Hopper|Walter Hopps|Robert Irwin|Ivan Karp|Craig Kauffman|David Lafaille|David Meltzer|Ed Moses|Shirley Neilsen Blum|Jim Newman|Peter Plagens|Ken Price|Vivian Rowan|Edward Ruscha|Dean Stockwell|Andy Warhol
title: The Cool School
